articles.title: Man, 31, deboarded for refusing to wear seat belt - The Times of India
articles.description: A 31-year-old man from West Bengal was deboarded from a flight for refusing to wear a seat belt. The incident occurred in Chennai, where the man created a disturbance after refusing to comply with safety instructions.
